errors.error_description: The instructions for building the documentation specify entering the `docs` folder, but the correct folder name containing the Makefile is `doc`.
correction_candidates: To locally build the documentation, enter the `doc` folder and enter `make html` in terminal.
To locally build the documentation, run `make -C doc html` from the root directory.
The folder `docs` must be renamed to `doc` before running the command.
To locally build the documentation, enter the `doc/source` folder and enter `make html` in terminal.
errors.golden_answer: To locally build the documentation, enter the `doc` folder and enter `make html` in terminal.
